text: allah abhimata kale nam misa ma venuven yam yahapatak kirimata ho haniyak kirimata ho mama balaya nodarami. adrsyamana dæ gæna ma dæna ganneku va sitiye nam ma yahapata adhika vasayen karagannata tibuni. tavada mata napurak æti novanu æta. ma avavada karanneku ha visvasa karana janayata subharamci danvanneku misa næta
